basics.name: Keven do Nascimento Carneiro
basics.label: C# Software Engineer using Amazon Web Services Infrastructure
basics.summary: Software Engineer that works with C# .NET programming language, actually rewriting a existing financial software into CQRS pattern, using concepts like SOLID, TDD, IoC; Using Cloud based infrastructure using Amazon Web Services, using services like EC2, S3, RDS, Simple Queue Service, Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda, CloudWatch and Continuous Integration with TeamCity and Cake (C# Make); Previous experiences involves administrating Linux production servers, tuning SQL Queries, Dynamics CRM configuration and implantation, CMS system administration and configuration.

work.summary: Working in a Financial Software, written in C# ASP.NET MVC and WebApi, using TeamCity as Continuous Integration tool, using Aurelia with Stylus in front-end stack, hosted using the Amazon Web Services infrastructure.

Developing and maintaining Web-based systems written in C# (ASP.NET MVC 5 and Web API 2), PHP and Java with SQL Server, MySQL and PostgreSQL databases, cloud servers configuration, cache dynamic-generated content as static pages, configuring digital certificates, log analysis, SEO strategies, Google Analytics configuration with custom variables.
Responsible for updating the CMS, development of hotsites and managing Microsoft Dynamics CRM, also Web programming with C# Web Api, PHP, MySQL as database and Joomla as CMS.
Create and send custom HTML Emails and statistical analysis of those e-mails (read rate, open rate, bounce rate, etc).

education.area: Systems Analysis and Development, Information Technology

education.institution: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Ceará

education.area: Computer Technician with emphasis in Software Development, Information Technology
courses: Web Programming with PHP, HTML and MySQL
